mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `LR_LRC_SESSION` ( `lrcSessionId` INTEGER (16) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `lrcSessionKey` VARCHAR (64), `lrcKey` VARCHAR (64), `lrcs` VARCHAR (64), `ipAddress` VARCHAR (64), `activeTime` VARCHAR (64), PRIMARY KEY (`lrcSessionId`));
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `LR_LRC_SESSION` ( lrcSessionId, lrcSessionKey, lrcKey, lrcs, ipAddress, activeTime ) VALUES ( #{lrcSessionId}, #{lrcSessionKey}, #{lrcKey}, #{lrcs}, #{ipAddress}, #{activeTime} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE `LR_LRC_SESSION` SET
lrcSessionKey = #{lrcSessionKey},
lrcKey = #{lrcKey},
lrcs = #{lrcs},
ipAddress = #{ipAddress},
activeTime = #{activeTime},
WHERE lrcSessionKey = #{lrcSessionKey}
